__TOC__


== GNOME Power Manager ==

Here we have a sampling of bugs to work on for Hug Day.  After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your name in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after "background-color:" and before ";".  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged.  A potentially easier way to do this was <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-bugsquad/2007-November/000666.htThanks|again and we appreciate your help.ml mailed]]</nowiki> to the Bug Squad. 

Kubuntu users wishing to work on bugs in KDE's power manager, please see <nowiki>[[/KDE|here]]</nowiki>.

=== 198 bugs in New status ===
These are untriaged or not confirmed GNOME Power Manager bugs.

'''To mark it off the list you should:'''
To mark it off the list you should:

*** Ask for more details, take a look at <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DebuggingGNOMEPowerManager|DebuggingGNOMEPowerManager]]</nowiki> page for details, change the bug's status to "Incomplete" and subscribe yourself or
*** Try to recreate the bug in Hardy, document the test case in the description and change the bug's status to "Confirmed".
